title: x/tools/godoc: broken source links for cmd/*
body:
For example, visit http://tip.golang.org/cmd/vet/whitelist/. The link for whitelist.go in package files is to http://tip.golang.org/src/vet/whitelist/whitelist.go, which is a 404. The correct link is http://tip.golang.org/src/cmd/vet/whitelist/whitelist.go. Might affect golang.org as well.

cc @adg
